participant_2.background:
I would love to learn how to make my own clothes.
I like to stay in and cuddle with my dog on rainy days.
I love my pets very much and enjoy spending time with them.
I wake up early and go for a run to clear my head and start the day off right.
My cats and I love the rainy weather in Portland!

content.text: Hello! I am doing okay today. How are you doing?
I am good! Just got back from a walk with my dog.
What breed is your dog?
He is a chocolate labrador retriever!
Oh nice! I love labradors. They are so friendly.
They are! He is the sweetest dog ever.
I am not much of a morning person. I like to stay in and curl up with a good book.
I love curling up with a good book too! What are you reading right now?
I am reading a historical fiction novel about the American Revolution.
Oh that sounds interesting! I love historical fiction.
Me too! I love learning about the past.
Me too! It's so fascinating to learn about how things used to be.
Do you have any other hobbies besides reading?
I love to go for walks, and I also like to cook.
Cooking is a great hobby! I love trying new recipes.
Me too! I love experimenting in the kitchen.
It sounds like you have a lot of great hobbies!
Thanks! I like to keep busy.
I do too! I think it's important to have things to do that you enjoy.
I agree! It makes life more fun.
